programme.title: Barry Goldwater, and Reagan's speech
programme.short_synopsis: The state of the Republican Party in 1994 and the importance of a speech by Ronald Reagan.
programme.medium_synopsis: Former Senator Barry Goldwater, the speech that won Ronald Reagan the Governorship of California and the state of the Republican Party in 1994 are assessed by Alistair Cooke.
